# mapType

**Instance Property**

The map’s visual style.

## Declaration

```swift
var mapType: MKMapType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapType/standard].

## Properties

- **filterType**: The filter options for the search results.
- **pinColor**: The color of the pin head.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
- **showsPointsOfInterest**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the map displays point-of-interest information.
